description: Enterprise techniques used by OSX_OCEANLOTUS.D, ATT&CK software S0352 v1.0
name: OSX_OCEANLOTUS.D (S0352)

techniques.comment: OSX_OCEANLOTUS.D can run commands through a terminal on the victim’s machine.
OSX_OCEANLOTUS.D scrambles and encrypts data using AES256 before sending it to the C2 server.
OSX_OCEANLOTUS.D has a command to delete a file from the system.
OSX_OCEANLOTUS.D sets the main loader file’s attributes to hidden.
OSX_OCEANLOTUS.D can create a persistence file in the folder /Library/LaunchAgents.
OSX_OCEANLOTUS.D can create a persistence file in the folder /Library/LaunchDaemons.
OSX_OCEANLOTUS.D encrypts its strings in RSA256 and encodes them in a custom base64 scheme and XOR.
OSX_OCEANLOTUS.D has a command to download and execute a file on the victim’s machine.
OSX_OCEANLOTUS.D uses macros for execution as well as VBS and PowerShell scripts.
OSX_OCEANLOTUS.D collects the MAC address, computer name, hardware UUID, serial number, and operating system version.
